Generated Narrative: ValueSet gridhamd-answer-options-vs-q6

  • Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
    CodeDisplay
    Q6-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q6-2Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Absent or clinically insignificant
    Q6-3Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Occasional
    Q6-4Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Much of the time
    Q6-5Mild (30 – 59 minutes awake) and Almost all the time
    Q6-6Marked (1 hour or more awake) and Occasional
    Q6-7Marked (1 hour or more awake) and Much of the time
    Q6-8Marked (1 hour or more awake) and Almost all the time

title: GRID-HAMD Answer Options ValueSet
description: ValueSet including Q6 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.
